scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push --skip-generate --accept-data-loss 2>/dev/null || echo 'DB push skipped (no DATABASE_URL or DB unavailable)'
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run db:push
